citances.sentence:
In his decision, Spencer v Neo Rock Pty Ltd [2009] FCA 845 at [5] , Greenwood J set out the circumstances surrounding the hearing before him on 3 August 2009. He noted that, on the day before the hearing, Mr Spencer wrote a letter to the Court seeking, among other things, an adjournment of the matter for a week or so. Greenwood J noted that the letter concluded with this statement:
In the alternative, [the Court] may be minded to determine the matters 'on the papers' if there is power to do so as appears may be the case. I have no objection to that course.
